Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision: Assign a specific User Story to a specific Sprint (1 if yes, 0 if no).

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision: Assign a specific Worker to a specific Task (1 if yes, 0 if no).

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary decision: Assign a specific Worker to a specific Team (1 if yes, 0 if no).

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision: Include a specific Feature in a specific Release Plan (1 if yes, 0 if no).

Name: start_date_of_sprint
Description: Integer variable representing the start day of a sprint (e.g., day number from project start).

Name: task_sequence_order
Description: Integer variable defining the order in which tasks for a user story should be executed.

Name: team_size_for_project
Description: Integer variable determining the number of workers assigned to a team for a project.

Name: effort_allocated_to_task
Description: Continuous variable for the number of hours allocated to a specific task.

Name: sprint_count_for_release
Description: Integer variable defining how many sprints are planned for a particular release.

Name: budget_allocated_to_feature
Description: Continuous variable representing the portion of the project budget allocated to a specific feature.

Name: worker_availability_percentage
Description: Continuous variable setting the percentage of a worker's time available for project work.
